      This method will figure out if the passed in path is relative meaning relative to the WAR and will use the Servlet.CONTEXT to find the real path or if the passed in path is Absolutely meaning absolute to the file system.

      • getAbsolutlePath

        public static java.lang.String getAbsolutlePath(java.lang.String path)
        This method will figure out if the passed in path is relative meaning relative to the WAR and will use the Servlet.CONTEXT to find the real path or if the passed in path is Absolutely meaning absolute to the file system. It will return the full path or the file or directory
        Parameters:
        path - the passed in path. If it starts with a / or \ or [a-z]: then it is considered a full path
        Returns:
